content: chain space attach yarn and make chain 1 * 2 single_crochet chain 1 2 single_crochet in chain space 7 single_crochet in next each stitch repeat from * 4 more times join round using slip_stitch picture 10 - 14 cut the yarn and fasten - 5 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials for a big square using color #1 row 3 in 3 chain space attach color # 1 and make chain 3 this counts as the first double_crochet 2dc chain 3 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in 1 chain space 1 chain * 3 double_crochet in next chain space chain 3 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in 1 chain space 1 chain repeat from * 3 times slip_stitch to complete the circle picture 15 - 17 cut the yarn and fasten - 6 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials border for big granny squares using color #1 or #2 row 4 in 3 chain space attach yarn and make chain 1 * 2 single_crochet chain 1 2 single_crochet in chain space 11 single_crochet in next each stitch repeat from * 4 more times join round using slip_stitch picture 10 - 14 cut the yarn and fasten - 7 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials you can make one more row of single stitches for a wider border using color # 1 or # 2 picture 20 20 attach the squares to each other with metal rings and fasten the clasp you can hang the squares to your taste in any order you will get unique earrings in the same way you can crochet a pendant or even a bracelet - 8 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials - 9 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials - 10 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials - 11 - https //linktr ee/crochet_knit_tutorials - 12 -
